value.title: Prioritize your issues and apply security controls
value.excerpt: Threat modeling provides you with a list of threats and ways to reduce or eliminate risk, but it doesn't prioritize them for you. Also, there are no layered security control recommendations based on their type and function.

value.title: Provide context with the right depth layer
value.excerpt: Threat models can get complex if all parties involved cannot agree on a data-flow diagram depth layer that provides enough context to satisfy requirements

value.title: Tune hyperparameters with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Choosing optimal hyperparameter values for model training can be difficult, and usually involved a great deal of trial and error. With Azure Machine Learning, you can leverage cloud-scale experiments to tune hyperparameters.

value.title: Organize code using TypeScript namespaces
value.excerpt: Learn how to use TypeScript namespaces' to organize code.

value.title: Upload your project by using GitHub best practices
value.excerpt: Learn to upload your existing project to GitHub.

value.title: Use data loading best practices in Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Use data loading best practices in Azure Synapse Analytics

value.title: Utilize threat intelligence in Azure Sentinel
value.excerpt: Utilize threat intelligence in Azure Sentinel

value.title: Plan for cloud workload protections using Azure Defender
value.excerpt: Plan for cloud workload protections using Azure Defender

value.title: Work with DataFrames in Azure Databricks
value.excerpt: Work with DataFrames in Azure Databricks

value.title: Work with DataFrames columns in Azure Databricks
value.excerpt: Work with DataFrames columns in Azure Databricks

value.title: Work with Azure Machine Learning to deploy serving models
value.excerpt: Work with Azure Machine Learning to deploy serving models

value.title: Extract data from forms with Form Recognizer
value.excerpt: Form Recognizer extracts data at scale to enable the submission of documents in real time, at scale, with accuracy. This module gives users the tools to use the Azure Form Recognizer vision API.

value.title: 60 seconds to a Linkerd service mesh on AKS | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: See just how easy it is to deploy a service mesh to your AKS cluster. William Morgan, maintainer of the open source service mesh Linkerd, joins Scott Hanselman to demonstrate just how easy it is to deploy Linkerd. Together they explore how to debug a live microservices application using the service mesh,
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/f8R3Y_geZwU" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Automate Azure resources with Ansible | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Kylie Liang joins Lara Rubbelke to demo how to use Ansible, an open-source, simple IT automation engine for automating cloud provisioning, configuration management and application deployments on Azure. Kylie also shares the roadmap for Ansible on Azure. [00:15] Demo Start   For more information:  + Ansible

value.title: Azure AD Managed Service Identity | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Arturo Lucatero joins Donovan Brown to discuss Azure AD Managed Service Identity, which can be used to authenticate to any service that supports Azure AD authentication. For more information, see: What is Managed Service Identity (MSI) for Azure resources? (docs): https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/managed-service-identity/overview

value.title: Azure Friday | Apache Kafka on HDInsight
value.excerpt: Raghav Mohan joins Scott Hanselman to talk about Apache Kafka on HDInsight, which added the open-source distributed streaming platform last year to complete a scalable, big data streaming scenario on Azure. The service has come a long way since - processing millions of events/sec, petabytes of data/day
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/gttwnNDHuZ4" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Azure Friday | Azure App Service with Hybrid Connections to On-premises Resources
value.excerpt: Christina Compy joins Scott Hanselman to talk about the recently relaunched App Service Hybrid Connections. This feature enables your apps in the App Service to reach resources on other networks. Those other networks can be in Azure, on-premises or networks in other cloud providers.   Azure App Service
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/y_zAJZC_8Yk" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Azure Friday | Azure Backup
value.excerpt: Even though Azure takes three copies of your virtual machines and stores them in Azure Storage, you still need to protect your data against ransomware, corruption, or accidental deletion. Kelly Anderson stops by to chat with Scott Hanselman about how simple it is to set up Azure Backup, how its built-in
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/HJeCqbbT-5s" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Azure Friday | Azure IoT Hub
value.excerpt: Olivier Bloch joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure IoT and how it is more than just about connecting IoT devices and sending telemetry to the Cloud. They also talk about Azure IoT device topics such as twins, provisioning, and lifecycle management.  For more information, see:  Azure IoT Hub - http://aka.ms/azureiotgetstarted

value.title: Azure Friday | Visually build pipelines for Azure Data Factory V2
value.excerpt: Gaurav Malhotra shows Donovan Brown how you can now visually build pipelines for Azure Data Factory V2 and be more productive by getting pipelines up & running quickly without writing any code.  For more information, see:  ADF v2: Visual Tools enabled in public preview (blog) - https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/adf-v2-visual-tools-enabled-in-public-preview/

value.title: Azure Reserved VM Instances (RIs) | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Yashesvi Sharma joins Scott Hanselman to discuss how to significantly reduce costs up to 72 percent compared to pay-as-you-go prices with one-year or three-year terms on Windows and Linux virtual machines (VMs). When you combine the cost savings gained from Azure RIs with the added value of the Azure

value.title: Azure Security best practices | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn about Azure Security best practices.   For more tips and tricks, visit: https://aka.ms/azuretipsandtricks   Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. value.title: Azure Security Center | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Kelly Anderson joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure Security Center, which offers built-in security management and threat protection for your cloud workloads. Azure Security Center helps you find & fix vulnerabilities, aids in blocking malicious access and alerts you when your resources are under attack.

value.title: Best practices for Azure Container Instances (ACI) with GitHub Actions | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Azure Container Instances (ACI) allow for a quick, simple, and cost effective way to run serverless containers in production. ACI is generally available and is for hosting serverless containerized workloads, including ETL pipelines, serverless batch jobs, and API microservices. Come hang out with Scott

value.title: Building a balancing robot with Azure Sphere | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Mike Hall shows Scott Hanselman how his team built a self-balancing robot using Azure Sphere and Azure RTOS that can be controlled and updated remotely from Azure IoT Central. value.title: Cloud Security Posture Management (CSPM) with Azure Security Center | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Azure Security Center enables you to strengthen your security posture. value.excerpt: Data integration is complex and has many moving parts that spans across hybrid data environments. value.title: Deploy your Web App in Windows Containers on Azure App Service | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Windows Container support is available in preview in Azure App Service.
